A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: An astoundingly beautiful film. It took everything we expected and turned it on it's head. TLJ brilliantly deconstructs the things we've come to think we know about the Star Wars universe and what it means to be  part of it. It focused more on producing a great film with engaging characters and emotional payoff than confirming fan-servicy internet theories. The direction this movie takes our heroes is honestly very exciting. I'll give this movie a 9.75/10
